import _objectSpread from"/home/christian/Escritorio/main/yugi-app/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{GET_ALL_CARDS,GET_CARDS_BY_NAME,GET_CARD_BY_ID}from"../actions";import*as ctrl from"../controllers";var initalState={allCards:[],cards:[]};//norma(); //comes from controllers
export default function rootReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_ALL_CARDS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{allCards:action.payload});case GET_CARDS_BY_NAME:var myCards=state.allCards.data;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cards:myCards.filter(function(card){return card.name.normalizing().includes(action.payload.toLowerCase());})});case GET_CARD_BY_ID:var myCard=state.cards;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cards:myCard.filter(function(c){return c.id==action.payload;})});default:return state;}}
